meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1704.

td.p: Jo-Ann Raines, an associate director from South Orange, New Jersey
Mark Zunk, a lawyer from Indianapolis, Indiana
Walter Mayes, a publisher sales representative from San Francisco, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,200)

tr.td: AROUND THE WORLD
CLICHES
COOKING
WEAPONS
KIDDIE LIT
FINAL RESTING PLACES

the United States

MarkJo-Ann
')

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'This 1955 movie musical featured Rod Steiger in a dream ballet choreographed by Agnes de Mille')

tr.td: MOVIE MUSICALS
This 1955 movie musical featured Rod Steiger in a dream ballet choreographed by Agnes de Mille
Walter
Mark
Jo-Ann
2-day champion: $33,201 & a copy of the Jeopardy! home game (The Pressman 25th anniversary) and a Jeopardy! computer game
2nd place: 5 day/5 night trip to Smuggler's Notch in Vermont w/airfare from Delta Airlines & a copy of the Jeopardy! home game (The Pressman 25th anniversary edition) and a Jeopardy! computer game
3rd place: Telescope from Meade & a copy of the Jeopardy! home game (The Pressman 25th anniversary edition) and a Jeopardy! computer game
Walter
Mark
Jo-Ann

25 R
(including 2 DDs),
3 W

21 R
(including 1 DD),
1 W

7 R,
3 W
